core

Class VirtualDisk

  • java.lang.Object
    • tree.SimpleTreeNode
      • core.VNode
        • core.Container
          • core.VirtualDisk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VirtualDisk
extends Container
    A representation of a Virtual Disk in the file system. A VirtualDisk object can be serialized to store the tree structure where it will be the root.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String fileName
      path to the file where the virtual disk will be serialized on the host file system
      int id
      id of the virutal disk

    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualDisk

        public VirtualDisk(java.lang.String name,
                   long space)
            throws java.io.IOException
        creates a VirtualDisk
        Parameters:
        name - of the virtual disk
        space - dimension of the virtual disk
        Throws:
        exceptions.SizeNotAllowedException - if space is greater than VirtualFileSystem.MaximumSizeAllowed
        java.io.IOException - if i/o file operations fail

      • VirtualDisk

            throws java.io.IOException
        creates a VirtualDisk with name=id
        Parameters:
        space - dimension of the virtual disk
        Throws:
        exceptions.SizeNotAllowedException - if space is greater than VirtualFileSystem.MaximumSizeAllowed
        java.io.IOException - if i/o file operations fail

        public long getFreeSpace()
        Returns:
        free space on the virtual disk

      • getNextFreeBlockPosition

        public long getNextFreeBlockPosition()
        Returns:
        next free block position on the virtual disk file. -1 if all blocks are occupied.
